title: Fullstack Developer
description:
You will own and build the end-to-end web / mobile stack for our EV charging / mobility platform.
You’ll work in a cross-functional team, integrate with B2B partners, build APIs, ensure security,
and deliver reliable experiences to both web and app users. Your work will directly impact how
fleets, charge point operators, and drivers use our platform.
responsibilities: Design, build, test, deploy, and maintain full-stack features (frontend + backend)
Build and consume REST / GraphQL APIs, integrating with B2B / partner systems
Work on geospatial / mapping / location-based services (e.g. station discovery, routing)
Handle user authentication, authorization flows, security, encryption
Implement caching, performance optimization, scaling for high usage / spikes
Work closely with mobile app (Flutter) teams
Maintain CI/CD pipelines, automations, environment configuration
Ensure code quality, test coverage, maintainability, code reviews

required_skills: REST APIs, validating inputs, XSS, CSRF mitigation
preferred_skills: REST APIs, validating inputs, XSS, CSRF mitigation
requirements.required_education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Related Field

title: Flutter Developer - Cross Platform Applications
description:
We're seeking an experienced Flutter Developer to join our dynamic engineering team and
drive the development of our next-generation cross-platform applications. You'll be instrumental
in building robust, scalable solutions that serve our clients in the rapidly evolving mobility and
EV charging sectors.

As a key member of our development team, you'll collaborate closely with fullstack developers,
product managers, and UX designers to deliver exceptional user experiences across iOS,
Android, and Web platforms.

required_skills: Design and develop cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, focusing on delivering high-quality, responsive, and user-friendly experiences.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including designers and product managers, to translate project requirements into actionable development tasks.
Optimize mobile applications for maximum performance and compatibility across various platforms, including iOS and Android and Web Apps
Develop feature-rich applications for mobility and EV charging ecosystem stakeholders
Implement real-time data synchronization for charging station management and fleet
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to app performance, functionality, and integration, ensuring a seamless user experience
Write maintainable, testable, and well-documented code following industry best practices
requirements.required_education: Bachelor's in Computer Science and Related Field
